What parts of yourself are you pretending not to see because acknowledging them would force you to change?
Who in your life are you holding onto out of fear, not love & what does that say about your needs?
What emotions do you avoid most? And, what would happen if you let yourself fully feel it?
When was the last time you felt deeply ashamed? What did that moment reveal about who you think you should/want to be?
What do you find yourself envying most in others? And, what does that envy reveal about your unmet desires or potential? List 3 things you can do to get closer to reaching your dreams.
